mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum no, t.* FROM ( SELECT c.conn_lesson_no, m.user_no, m.user_name, f.lesson_no, f.lesson_title, f.lesson_subject, f.max_people, c.leg_date, NVL(z.cnt, 0) cnt FROM connected_lesson c INNER JOIN membership m ON(c.student = m.user_no) INNER JOIN find_lesson f ON(c.lesson_no = f.lesson_no) LEFT JOIN (select c.lesson_no, count(*) cnt from connected_lesson c where c.is_end = 0 AND c.is_connected = 1 GROUP BY c.lesson_no) z ON(z.lesson_no = c.lesson_no) WHERE teacher = #{userNo} AND is_connected = 0 ORDER BY c.conn_lesson_no ) t ORDER BY no ) x WHERE no between #{paging.startNo} AND #{paging.endNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE connected_lesson SET is_connected = 1 WHERE conn_lesson_no = #{connNo}
mapper.select: SELECT f.max_people, f.lesson_no FROM connected_lesson c INNER JOIN find_lesson f ON(c.lesson_no = f.lesson_no) WHERE c.conn_lesson_no = #{connNo}
select count(*) from connected_lesson c where lesson_no = #{lessonNo} AND c.is_connected = 1 AND c.is_end = 0

select f.lesson_no, f.lesson_title, f.lesson_content, f.lesson_loc, f.lesson_age, f.lesson_price, f.lesson_subject, f.max_people, m.user_name, m.user_id from find_lesson f INNER JOIN membership m ON(f.user_no = m.user_no) where lesson_no = #{lessonNo}
select user_name, user_id, user_birth, user_email, user_gender from membership where user_no = #{studentNo}
mapper.update: update find_lesson SET lesson_state = 0 WHERE lesson_no = #{lessonNo}
